thread.section_title: Biz2Credit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biz2Credit | biz2credit.com
thread.title: Sam

author: Sam
title: Sam
text:
Robert was my contact, he made the experience great from start to finish. They had a decision to me in less than 24 hrs. after I got them the information requested.
They were always available to answer my questions thru the process and patient with me while I reviewed documents and language.
I am looking forward to using them for more transactions in the future and doing away with banks and their long winded reviews and committees. I will be recommending Robert and Biz2credit to my other business contacts.
